schedule: Rio de Janeiro – São Paulo – Curitiba – Florianópolis
circumstances: The approach to Florianópolis Airport was completed in heavy rain falls. On final, the pilot in command decided to attempt a go around and increased the power on both engines when the right engine failed. The aircraft stalled and crashed into the sea few hundred yards off shore. Three passengers were killed while 11 other occupants were injured.
probable_cause: Failure of the right engine during a go around procedure.
